author: ifedorenko
msg: Update to use maven 3.0 and other improvements
Made necessary changes to update maven version from 3.0-alpha-4 to 3.0.
so I can work on the code inside m2e.
plexus container customization by subclasses. Specific usecase was to enable
JSR330 support, but should be useful in other cases.
configured Mojo instance. Unlike other lookupMojo methods, lookupConfiguredMojo
uses maven plugin parameter default values, so test can use much smaller and
Introduced AbstractMojoTestCase newMavenSession and newMojoExecution helper
methods. These helpers are used by lookupConfiguredMojo but should be useful
